Sharing Session : How to Win FRGS & PRGS Grant
==============================================

by [researchpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/researchpic/ "Posts by researchpic")
 | Apr 11, 2017 | [Research](https://fke.utm.my/category/research/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/frgs.png)

In this event, the speaker shared on how to write a good research proposal (the winning way) for FRGS and PRGS. This grant is under Ministry of Higher Education (MOHE) Malaysia

Some of the approach mentioned:

1.  Focus and address each section of the proposal
2.  Strictly follow the guidelines – the most recent
3.  Look at the examples of past successful and rejected comments

More info, log on to www.rmc.utm.my
